scripts.build: npm run clean && for file in *.md; do if [ "$file" != "README.md" ]; then slidev build "$file" --out "dist/$(basename "$file" .md)"; fi; done
scripts.dev: echo "Please run 'pnpm slidev your-presentation.md' to start a dev server."
scripts.export: for file in *.md; do if [ "$file" != "README.md" ]; then slidev export "$file" --output "dist/$(basename "$file" .md).pdf"; fi; done
